# Toni Anev - LLM Full Context

## Identity

Toni Anev is a Machine Learning Engineering Lead focused on AI infrastructure, MLOps systems, and production ML platform delivery.

## Public Positioning

- Builds ML platforms and engineering systems for reliable production delivery.
- Leads teams and cross-functional programs for high-stakes ML outcomes.
- Focuses on reproducibility, reliability, and speed-to-production.

## Public Highlights

### Sanofi

- Led architecture and scale-out of a global AI/HPC platform.
- Standardized Terraform-based infrastructure and automated compute provisioning.
- Improved platform throughput and reduced model productionization cycle time.

### Petco

- Led ML engineering for pricing and personalization systems.
- Reduced runtime and compute load for pricing platform workflows.
- Supported personalization outcomes tied to meaningful business impact.

### Loblaw

- Built production ML/data systems across pricing, promotions, and segmentation.
- Reduced orchestration latency and improved operational efficiency.
- Contributed to enterprise-scale, revenue-linked ML decision systems.

## Technical Focus Areas

- ML platform architecture
- MLOps release workflows and reliability controls
- Environment contracts and reproducible delivery
- CI/CD-integrated ML quality and release gates
- Engineering leadership and operating model design
